description: This file defines functions for managing crontab entries, including adding, removing, and checking crontab entries. It provides function prototypes with descriptions for external use.

methods.name: addOrUpdatePreformattedCrontabEntry
methods.description: Adds or updates a pre-formatted crontab entry in the root crontab file.

methods.name: removeCrontabEntry
methods.description: Removes a specified crontab entry identified by name.

methods.name: hasCrontabEntry
methods.description: Checks if a crontab entry exists, returning status codes indicating existence and matching status.
